creator: apache@kri.st
text:
typing 
configure --layout does not give a printout of the layout as configured...

Nevertheless the documentation for suexec
(http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/suexec.html) suggests using this option to
find out how things are configured..

It would be nice to have this option back.
The docs have been fixed to remove this.  Thanks for your note.
creator: slive@apache.org
